trans-unit.source: Using Windows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Using Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Using Windows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Using Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[wps_1](../Token/wps_1_md.md)] is a task\-based command\-line shell and scripting language designed especially for system administration.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[wps_1](../Token/wps_1_md.md)] is a task\-based command\-line shell and scripting language designed especially for system administration.

trans-unit.source: Built on the .NET Framework, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] helps IT professionals and power users control and automate the administration of the Windows operating system and applications that run on Windows.
trans-unit.target: Built on the .NET Framework, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] helps IT professionals and power users control and automate the administration of the Windows operating system and applications that run on Windows.

trans-unit.source: Resources in this section help you learn about [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], features that are included with [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], and the graphical [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] editor, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] Integrated Scripting Environment.
trans-unit.target: Resources in this section help you learn about [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], features that are included with [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], and the graphical [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] editor, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] Integrated Scripting Environment.

trans-unit.source: What’s In This Section
trans-unit.target: What’s In This Section

trans-unit.source: Content in this section can help you learn more about [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], how to use [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], and what is new in [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] in the most current releases.
trans-unit.target: Content in this section can help you learn more about [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], how to use [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], and what is new in [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] in the most current releases.

trans-unit.target: [What's New in Windows PowerShell](../Topic/What-s-New-in-Windows-PowerShell.md).

trans-unit.target: Documentation for [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] ISE, a graphical [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] script editor and console.

trans-unit.target: [Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) Overview](assetId:///04c9e716-822c-40f0-8fdf-f2dda8abd888).

trans-unit.source: An introduction to a new feature for [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] 4.0, Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC).
trans-unit.target: An introduction to a new feature for [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] 4.0, Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC).

trans-unit.source: DSC can help administrators achieve consistent configurations in Windows environments, and on devices such as network switches.
trans-unit.target: DSC can help administrators achieve consistent configurations in Windows environments, and on devices such as network switches.

trans-unit.target: How to start [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] from the Windows Command Prompt, and run basic [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] commands.

trans-unit.target: [Windows PowerShell Glossary](../Topic/Windows-PowerShell-Glossary.md).

trans-unit.source: Learn about common terms used in [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] and its documentation.
trans-unit.target: Learn about common terms used in [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] and its documentation.

trans-unit.source: Related Technologies
trans-unit.target: Related Technologies

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] is part of a family of related scripting technologies that help you automate remote management of Windows\-based computers.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] is part of a family of related scripting technologies that help you automate remote management of Windows\-based computers.

trans-unit.source: Links to more information about these technologies are included here for you.
trans-unit.target: Links to more information about these technologies are included here for you.

trans-unit.source: [Windows PowerShell Workflow](http://technet.microsoft.com/library/jj134242.aspx).
trans-unit.target: [Windows PowerShell Workflow](http://technet.microsoft.com/library/jj134242.aspx).

trans-unit.source: First introduced in [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] Workflow lets IT Pros and developers leverage the benefits of [Windows Workflow Foundation](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ee342461.aspx) with the automation capabilities and ease of [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: First introduced in [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] Workflow lets IT Pros and developers leverage the benefits of [Windows Workflow Foundation](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ee342461.aspx) with the automation capabilities and ease of [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: [Windows PowerShell Web Access](http://technet.microsoft.com/library/hh831611.aspx).
trans-unit.target: [Windows PowerShell Web Access](http://technet.microsoft.com/library/hh831611.aspx).

trans-unit.source: First introduced in [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] Web Access acts as a [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] gateway, providing a web\-based [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] console that is targeted at a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: First introduced in [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] Web Access acts as a [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] gateway, providing a web\-based [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] console that is targeted at a remote computer.

trans-unit.source: It enables IT Pros to run [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] commands and scripts from a [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] console in a web browser, with no [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], remote management software, or browser plug\-in installation necessary on the client device.
trans-unit.target: It enables IT Pros to run [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] commands and scripts from a [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] console in a web browser, with no [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], remote management software, or browser plug\-in installation necessary on the client device.

trans-unit.source: [Windows PowerShell Web Services (Management OData IIS Extension)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/hh880865.aspx).
trans-unit.target: [Windows PowerShell Web Services (Management OData IIS Extension)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/hh880865.aspx).

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] Web Services is a framework for easily exposing [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] cmdlets through an OData\-based web service that is running in Web Server (IIS).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] Web Services is a framework for easily exposing [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] cmdlets through an OData\-based web service that is running in Web Server (IIS).

trans-unit.source: [Get Started with Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration](assetId:///c134aa32-b085-4656-9a89-955d8ff768d0).
trans-unit.target: [Get Started with Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration](assetId:///c134aa32-b085-4656-9a89-955d8ff768d0).

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] Desired State Configuration (DSC), introduced in [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)], is a new management platform in [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] that enables the deployment and management of configuration data for software services and the environment on which these services run.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] Desired State Configuration (DSC), introduced in [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)], is a new management platform in [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] that enables the deployment and management of configuration data for software services and the environment on which these services run.

trans-unit.source: DSC provides a set of [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] language extensions, new cmdlets, and resources that you can use to declaratively specify how you want the state of your software environment to be configured.
trans-unit.target: DSC provides a set of [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] language extensions, new cmdlets, and resources that you can use to declaratively specify how you want the state of your software environment to be configured.

trans-unit.source: [Windows Management Framework 4.0 Preview](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=293881) includes updates to [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] ISE, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] Web Services (Management OData IIS Extension), Windows Remote Management (WinRM), Windows Management Infrastructure (WMI), the Server Manager WMI provider, and a new feature for 4.0, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] Desired State Configuration (DSC).
trans-unit.target: [Windows Management Framework 4.0 Preview](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=293881) includes updates to [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] ISE, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] Web Services (Management OData IIS Extension), Windows Remote Management (WinRM), Windows Management Infrastructure (WMI), the Server Manager WMI provider, and a new feature for 4.0, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] Desired State Configuration (DSC).

trans-unit.source: Windows Management Framework 4.0 Preview allows you to install and use these technologies on computers that are running [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win7_client_firstref](../Token/win7_client_firstref_md.md)] SP1, and [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] SP1.
trans-unit.target: Windows Management Framework 4.0 Preview allows you to install and use these technologies on computers that are running [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win7_client_firstref](../Token/win7_client_firstref_md.md)] SP1, and [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] SP1.

trans-unit.source: [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) includes updates to [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] ISE, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] Web Services (Management OData IIS Extension), Windows Remote Management (WinRM), Windows Management Infrastructure (WMI), and the Server Manager WMI provider.
trans-unit.target: [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) includes updates to [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] ISE, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] Web Services (Management OData IIS Extension), Windows Remote Management (WinRM), Windows Management Infrastructure (WMI), and the Server Manager WMI provider.

trans-unit.source: Windows Management Framework 3.0 allows you to install and use these technologies on computers that are running [!INCLUDE[win7_client_firstref](../Token/win7_client_firstref_md.md)] SP1, Windows Server 2008 SP2, and [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] SP1.
trans-unit.target: Windows Management Framework 3.0 allows you to install and use these technologies on computers that are running [!INCLUDE[win7_client_firstref](../Token/win7_client_firstref_md.md)] SP1, Windows Server 2008 SP2, and [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] SP1.

trans-unit.source: Learning Windows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Learning Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: To begin learning [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], start with the following resources:
trans-unit.target: To begin learning [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], start with the following resources:

trans-unit.source: [Microsoft Virtual Academy: Getting Started with PowerShell 3.0 Jump Start](http://www.microsoftvirtualacademy.com/training-courses/advanced-tools-scripting-with-powershell-3-0-jump-start).
trans-unit.target: [Microsoft Virtual Academy: Getting Started with PowerShell 3.0 Jump Start](http://www.microsoftvirtualacademy.com/training-courses/advanced-tools-scripting-with-powershell-3-0-jump-start).

trans-unit.source: This Jump Start is designed to teach busy IT professionals, admins, and help desk people how to use [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] to improve management capabilities, automate redundant tasks, and manage the environment in scale.
trans-unit.target: This Jump Start is designed to teach busy IT professionals, admins, and help desk people how to use [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] to improve management capabilities, automate redundant tasks, and manage the environment in scale.

trans-unit.source: Learn how [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)]works and how to make [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] work for you from the experts Jeffrey Snover, the inventor of [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], and Jason Helmick, Senior Technologist at Concentrated Technology.
trans-unit.target: Learn how [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)]works and how to make [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] work for you from the experts Jeffrey Snover, the inventor of [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], and Jason Helmick, Senior Technologist at Concentrated Technology.

trans-unit.source: [Microsoft Virtual Academy: Advanced Tools & Scripting with PowerShell 3.0 Jump Start](http://www.microsoftvirtualacademy.com/training-courses/getting-started-with-powershell-3-0-jump-start).
trans-unit.target: [Microsoft Virtual Academy: Advanced Tools & Scripting with PowerShell 3.0 Jump Start](http://www.microsoftvirtualacademy.com/training-courses/getting-started-with-powershell-3-0-jump-start).

trans-unit.source: IT pros, take this advanced [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] course to find out how to turn your real time management and automation scripts into useful reusable tools and cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: IT pros, take this advanced [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] course to find out how to turn your real time management and automation scripts into useful reusable tools and cmdlets.

trans-unit.source: You’ll learn the best patterns and practices for building and maintaining tools and you’ll pick up some special tips and tricks along the way from the architect and inventor of [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], Distinguished Engineer Jeffrey Snover, and IT pro, Jason Helmick.
trans-unit.target: You’ll learn the best patterns and practices for building and maintaining tools and you’ll pick up some special tips and tricks along the way from the architect and inventor of [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], Distinguished Engineer Jeffrey Snover, and IT pro, Jason Helmick.

trans-unit.source: Downloading and Updating Windows PowerShell Help
trans-unit.target: Downloading and Updating Windows PowerShell Help

trans-unit.source: The following topics describe how you can get the latest Help for [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] and display it at the [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] command prompt.
trans-unit.target: The following topics describe how you can get the latest Help for [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] and display it at the [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] command prompt.

trans-unit.source: [Update-Help](http://technet.microsoft.com/library/hh849720.aspx) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: [Update-Help](http://technet.microsoft.com/library/hh849720.aspx) cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] cmdlet that downloads and installs the newest versions of help topics for [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] modules on your computer.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] cmdlet that downloads and installs the newest versions of help topics for [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] modules on your computer.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Updatable Help system in [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], including how to install Updatable Help on network\-isolated computers, see [about_Updatable_Help](http://technet.microsoft.com/library/hh847735.aspx), [Save-Help](http://technet.microsoft.com/library/hh849724.aspx), and [Supporting Updatable Help](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh852754.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For more information about the Updatable Help system in [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], including how to install Updatable Help on network\-isolated computers, see [about_Updatable_Help](http://technet.microsoft.com/library/hh847735.aspx), [Save-Help](http://technet.microsoft.com/library/hh849724.aspx), and [Supporting Updatable Help](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh852754.aspx).

trans-unit.source: [Get-Help](http://technet.microsoft.com/library/hh849696(v=wps.630).aspx) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: [Get-Help](http://technet.microsoft.com/library/hh849696(v=wps.630).aspx) cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] cmdlet that you can use to learn about the cmdlets and providers that are installed on your system.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] cmdlet that you can use to learn about the cmdlets and providers that are installed on your system.

trans-unit.source: You can get notifications about any updates to published Help files by subscribing to the following RSS feed: [http://sxp.microsoft.com/feeds/msdntn/PowerShellHelpVersions](http://sxp.microsoft.com/feeds/msdntn/PowerShellHelpVersions).
trans-unit.target: You can get notifications about any updates to published Help files by subscribing to the following RSS feed: [http://sxp.microsoft.com/feeds/msdntn/PowerShellHelpVersions](http://sxp.microsoft.com/feeds/msdntn/PowerShellHelpVersions).
